entity.lycanitesmobs.abaia.description: 它們通過身體產生電流進度侵略性攻擊的鰻魚。
entity.lycanitesmobs.abaia.habitat: 這些魚在海中產卵，意味著它們出生在鹹水海洋，然後在淡水河流中遷移和成熟，然後再次返回鹹水海中，有些最終被困在湖泊中，並在那裡建立了一個群體，因此它們可以在大多數地方找到。
entity.lycanitesmobs.abaia.combat: 當電鰻用它們的電流電擊它們附近的任何東西時，它們也會進行討人厭的撕咬。
entity.lycanitesmobs.abtu.description: 長著大牙的兇猛魚類！成年食人魚是很稀少的，非常難被找到，但如果你找到了，你最好趕快游走因為它們會和成群的幼年魚包圍你！
entity.lycanitesmobs.abtu.habitat: 這些魚普遍存在於鹹水海洋和海灘。
entity.lycanitesmobs.abtu.combat: 一旦一隻食人魚察覺到它的獵物，它會不顧一切地吞食它，它們甚至會跳到陸地上追逐獵物！成年的食人魚比較保守，但也很罕見，它們會叫附近的幼年魚來狩獵獵物。
entity.lycanitesmobs.aegis.description: 眾所周知的執法秩序元素，宙斯盾是在村莊周圍執法的，即使是小偷也會被無情地追捕。
entity.lycanitesmobs.aegis.habitat: 作為秩序元素，宙斯盾出現在秩序元素豐富的地區，因此村莊通常會創造這些生物。
entity.lycanitesmobs.aegis.combat: 宙斯盾有兩種模式可以轉換，一種是防禦盾模式，兩個大旋轉盾可以阻擋大部分的傷害，另一種是進攻劍模式，用四個旋轉刀刃撕碎目標。
entity.lycanitesmobs.afrit.description: 邪惡的火焰一心只想破壞，他們會積極地燃燒周圍的世界。
entity.lycanitesmobs.afrit.habitat: 這些小鬼通常會在熔岩池裡洗澡。
entity.lycanitesmobs.afrit.combat: 伊夫利特通常從遠處攻擊，投擲烈火球、烈火和強酸等致命組合，削弱被擊中的任何防禦。
entity.lycanitesmobs.aglebemu.descriptio: 一種十分擅長游泳的青蛙，擁有驚人的跳躍能力以及致命的長舌！
entity.lycanitesmobs.aglebemu.habitat: 這些兩棲動物通常生活在沼澤地。
entity.lycanitesmobs.aglebemu.combat: 箭毒蛙用它們強有力的、非常長的、鋒利的舌頭刺穿受害者，並注射一種由傳染性細菌造成的致命混合物。
entity.lycanitesmobs.apollyon.descriptio: Malicious demons that rule of areas of the nether, Apollyons enjoy the smell of their victim's burning flesh and enjoy watching other demons tear their victims apart!
entity.lycanitesmobs.apollyon.habitat: Apollyons live within the depths of the Nether.
entity.lycanitesmobs.apollyon.combat: Apollyons prefer to avoid combat themselves, instead they will strengthen any nearby demons and they will slowly engulf their target in flames.
entity.lycanitesmobs.argus.description: 破壞性的混沌元素，阿格斯在它們身後傳播浩劫。
entity.lycanitesmobs.argus.habitat: 作為混沌元素，阿格斯是當區域內存在大量混沌時形成的，這可能是由多種因素造成的，但通常破壞其他元素會導致高濃度的混沌。
entity.lycanitesmobs.argus.combat: 這些元素通過發射一個具有集中混沌能量的球體進行攻擊，這些球體的軌跡可能無法預測，並且在受到衝擊時，這些球體破壞了其真實的結構，導致不穩定。
entity.lycanitesmobs.arisaur.description: 阿里蛇頸龍是一種大型的覆蓋著植物的蜥腳類動物，它們是和平的，通常從樹上或從自己的背上吃草，共享一種共生關係。
entity.lycanitesmobs.arisaur.habitat: 阿里蛇頸龍通常在茂密的森林中發現，但也可以看到它們在平原遷移。
entity.lycanitesmobs.arisaur.combat: 阿里蛇頸龍通常是和平的。
entity.lycanitesmobs.arix.description: 不斷尋找食物的頑皮冰小鬼。
entity.lycanitesmobs.arix.habitat: 雪精靈在寒冷的溫度下茁壯成長，經常在寒冷的生物群係以及在冰冷的膠狀冰中沐浴。
entity.lycanitesmobs.arix.combat: 這些小鬼們揮舞著冰火，這是一種冰霜魔法，看起來和行為就像是火，但效果卻是凍結而不是燒傷。
entity.lycanitesmobs.asmodeus.descriptio: 阿斯摩蒂爾斯被認為是惡魔入侵的幕後主導，有時甚至可以和拉赫凡特相提並論。
entity.lycanitesmobs.asmodeus.habitat: 據說阿斯摩蒂爾斯起源於無盡肉體的巨大地獄層面，稱為煉獄，它們原本是強大的阿斯塔羅特，意思是一旦它們存在，它們只是陳腐的！
entity.lycanitesmobs.asmodeus.combat:
這個巨大的惡魔，或者說魔鬼，有著廣泛的攻擊，並且能夠用它的惡魔機械跳到很高的高度。它會週期性地使用巨大的加特林機槍對目標進行火力攻擊，同時也會大量攜帶護衛它的小武器。
第一階段：阿斯摩蒂爾斯將向外釋放砲彈環。
第二階段：阿斯摩蒂爾斯將召喚大型阿斯塔羅斯，它們將在他周圍投射一個盾牌，直到它們被摧毀。
第三階段：阿斯塔羅特將代替治療阿斯摩蒂爾斯，以及巨腦魔也被召喚。
entity.lycanitesmobs.aspid.description: 安靜的爬行動物背上長著奇怪的東西。阿斯匹德喜歡蘑菇，可以和它們一起繁殖。但是要小心，因為它們不斷地釋放出一團毒雲，通常會在它們身後留下一道毒雲。
entity.lycanitesmobs.aspid.habitat: 這些生物通常被發現在沼澤地，黑森林和蘑菇島，因為它們對菇類的愛！
entity.lycanitesmobs.aspid.combat: 阿斯匹德通常是和平的，但它們散發出的毒雲是相當危險的，但這些並不能阻止熱情的農民！
entity.lycanitesmobs.astaroth.descriptio: 一種由大腦以及紅石技術組成的統治者。如果你想快速躲過火焰的襲擊並殺死它，那麼腦內的蛆蟲會爬出來攻擊你！
entity.lycanitesmobs.astaroth.habitat: 據說這些惡魔起源於被稱為煉獄的無窮無盡的肉體地獄層，它們曾經只是陳腐的陳詞濫調，經常被發現在地獄之中。
entity.lycanitesmobs.astaroth.combat: 阿斯塔羅特使用強大的快速武器，將它們的惡魔能量提取成強大的彈射物，稱為惡魔之星，在碰到這些時可以導致凋零。如果阿斯塔羅特被擊殺，一小隊蛆蟲將從它們的屍體中出來，然後開始攻擊！
entity.lycanitesmobs.banshee.description: 女妖是可怕的相位元素，它們可以透過現實本身來相位，它們經常被聽到“歌唱”。據說元素其實是一雙眼睛，而不是它“目的”的屍體。地魔和幻靈元素也可以融合成強大的女妖。
entity.lycanitesmobs.banshee.habitat: 這些元素常出沒於怪誕和廢棄的地方，通常在廢棄礦井周圍，以及黑暗的森林和其他體現不安的地方。
entity.lycanitesmobs.banshee.combat: 與女妖接觸後，受害者的靈魂會被相位魔法震驚，這通常會引發恐懼和恐慌。
entity.lycanitesmobs.barghest.descriptio: 致命的山間掠食者，能跳得很高。犬鬼也是非常能幹的登山者，使它們成為山脈的特殊座騎。
entity.lycanitesmobs.barghest.habitat: 這些動物通常出現在山區和熱帶草原。
entity.lycanitesmobs.barghest.combat: 眾所周知，犬鬼會撲向獵物並將其撕碎，造成流血。
entity.lycanitesmobs.behemophet.descript: 高大的惡魔怪物，比蒙巨獸都是決心毀滅的強大惡魔。
entity.lycanitesmobs.behemophet.habitat: 比蒙巨獸可以在地獄中找到，如果它們足夠大，也會通過未受保護的傳送門入侵。
entity.lycanitesmobs.behemophet.combat: 這些惡魔投擲地獄火球，一種撕裂靈魂而產生的綠色火焰，不僅火焰會燃燒，而且它們也會凋零。
entity.lycanitesmobs.naxiris.description: Large hostile masses of eyes and tentacles with an eternal hunger for magic energy!
entity.lycanitesmobs.naxiris.habitat: Naxiris can be found in the mountains as they like high up places and dwell in large caves and ruins and come out at night.
entity.lycanitesmobs.naxiris.combat: These Aberrations bend arcane and void magic to create powerful Arcane Storms, that they blast from their mouths, these attacks then release deadly lasers in all directions and can be explosive on impact.
entity.lycanitesmobs.belphegor.descripti: 小但危險的惡魔，有一個一心要殺和吃東西的頭腦
entity.lycanitesmobs.belphegor.habitat: 這些惡魔可以在地獄找到，並會通傳送門入侵。
entity.lycanitesmobs.belphegor.combat: 貝爾費戈爾扔末日之火球， 一種由地獄魔法製成的火焰， 燃燒著不自然的紅光。
entity.lycanitesmobs.malwrath.descriptio: Large floating abominations of life. malwraths like to bully Ghasts for their delicious tears. Can be tamed as a flying pet.
entity.lycanitesmobs.malwrath.habitat: These demons fly around the fiery skies of the Nether.
entity.lycanitesmobs.malwrath.combat: malwraths spit large balls of Demonic Lightning, while not actually electrical, these are balls of explosive Nether energy that will wither on impact and release smaller Demonic Sparks in all direction.
entity.lycanitesmobs.calpod.description: 像白蟻一樣的昆蟲，它們成群地捕食！
entity.lycanitesmobs.calpod.habitat: 這些昆蟲可以在森林的灌木叢中找到，晚上出來活動。
entity.lycanitesmobs.calpod.combat: 樹蟻有一個討人厭的撕咬，必須盡快被殺死，因為它們會迅速呼叫更多的樹蟻加入它們。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cephignis.descripti: 適應極端溫度生活的大型和平魚類，其身體像熔岩一樣熱。岩漿魚可以用煤炭或木炭繁殖！
entity.lycanitesmobs.cephignis.habitat: 這些魚可以在熔岩中游泳，不能在熔岩外長期生存。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cephignis.combat: 岩漿魚通常是被動的，依靠它們的環境來保護它們免受大多數掠食者的傷害。
entity.lycanitesmobs.chupacabra.descript: 可怕的生物，它們對肉體的永不滿足的渴望，可以用來操縱和繁殖它們。
entity.lycanitesmobs.chupacabra.habitat: 卓柏卡布拉通常生活在黑暗洞穴的地下。
entity.lycanitesmobs.chupacabra.combat: 這些野獸以致命的撕咬和鋒利的利爪具有難以置信的攻擊性，但是它們的貪婪可以用來對付它們，因為它們會優先考慮大型獵物。它們的攻擊也會治癒它們。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cinder.description: 暴力的火元素，只尋求燃燒周圍的其他生物。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cinder.habitat: 作為火的元素，火元素是從純火中顯現出來的，因此它們會在有大量火的地方頻繁生成。然而，它們不會出現在不潔的火焰周圍，如熾焰或死焰。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cinder.combat: 火元素釋放出一種強大的痛風，可以燃燒敵人，但是這些火焰太弱，無法傳播更多的火。
entity.lycanitesmobs.clink.description: 奇怪的小鬼，在它們的手臂上迅速長出金屬刀片，然後很容易被分離。
entity.lycanitesmobs.clink.habitat: 這些小鬼經常在沙漠中被發現，因為它們以消耗礦物質生，就像肉一樣，它們沒有翅膀，所以在山區是找不到的。
entity.lycanitesmobs.clink.combat: 劈楔分離它們生長的刀刃並向敵人投擲。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cockatrice.descript: 像雙足飛龍一樣的致命巨型雞，非常危險，離我遠點！
entity.lycanitesmobs.cockatrice.habitat: 這些雙足動物通常出現在熱帶地區，比如叢林，因為它們喜歡吃水果和吞食大型昆蟲，當然，任何會移動的東西都在菜單上！
entity.lycanitesmobs.cockatrice.combat: 雞蛇獸用喙啄食，嘴上滴著麻痺和厭惡的毒素，據說這些毒素會讓受害者感覺自己變成石頭。
entity.lycanitesmobs.conba.description: 頑皮的猿類，對大便充滿了熱情！
entity.lycanitesmobs.conba.habitat: 這些猿類可以在熱帶生態域中找到，如叢林。
entity.lycanitesmobs.conba.combat: 喜歡把它們黏黏的大便扔到人身上，造成緩慢和反胃，同時製造翔雲以擴大這些效果。這些野獸也會努力保持距離。
entity.lycanitesmobs.concapede.descripti: 互相連接的奇怪甲蟲。頭在前面，從後面長出額外的分節，如果餵食蔬菜就會全神貫注，讓它們的分節受到攻擊，這種技術被農民使用。
entity.lycanitesmobs.concapede.habitat: 這些昆蟲可以在熱帶地區如叢林中找到。
entity.lycanitesmobs.concapede.combat: 貝狀百足蟲有毒，但只在夜間有敵意。
entity.lycanitesmobs.concapedesegment.de: 互相連接的奇怪甲蟲。分節通常與頭部相連並由頭部生長。如果與前面的頭部或其他分節分離，它將成長為頭部。只有部分是無法防禦的。
entity.lycanitesmobs.concapedesegment.ha: 分節生長的部分，可在熱帶地區如叢林中找到。
entity.lycanitesmobs.concapedesegment.co: 分節沒有防禦能力，但將由頭部保護，除非這些頭部忙於進食。
entity.lycanitesmobs.crusk.description: 大型沙蠕蟲，有厚厚的外骨骼保護它們。較小的幼崽可以被馴服，但是它們需要很長的時間才能成長，可以成為很好地保護性寵物。
entity.lycanitesmobs.crusk.habitat: 這些生物可以在沙漠沙丘中找到。
entity.lycanitesmobs.crusk.combat: 死亡之蟲撕咬得很厲害，可以潛入柔軟地形，如沙子、草方塊或泥土。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cryptkeeper.descrip: 木乃伊化的屍體，不像通常的亡靈，它們不會在陽光下燃燒。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cryptkeeper.habitat: 這些亡靈經常在夜間的沙漠出沒。
entity.lycanitesmobs.cryptkeeper.combat: 地穴守護者使用近戰攻擊並傳播造成厭惡的有害細菌。
entity.lycanitesmobs.darkling.descriptio: 骯髒的小陰影昆蟲喜歡抓住它們的受害者，慢慢地吸乾它們的血液！你最好快點把這些害蟲趕走！
entity.lycanitesmobs.darkling.habitat: 這些昆蟲可以在黑暗的地下區域找到。
entity.lycanitesmobs.darkling.combat: 嗜血蝨蟲會跳到受害者身上，抓住它們開始快速吸血的地方，這將治癒它們，快速殺死它們至關重要。
entity.lycanitesmobs.dawon.description: 貓科動物的結晶體，有時在它們的身體上能發現罕見的晶體。
entity.lycanitesmobs.dawon.habitat: 這些野獸可以在叢林中找到。
entity.lycanitesmobs.dawon.combat: 水晶貓會攻擊目標，使獵物降低移動速度。
entity.lycanitesmobs.zephyr.description: Proud Air Elementals that guard the skies from those that they think shouldn't be up there!
entity.lycanitesmobs.zephyr.habitat: Being Air Elementals, these creatures commonly manifest high up in the sky.
entity.lycanitesmobs.zephyr.combat: Zephyr unleash deadly whirlwind rings that inflict the levitation debuff on impact.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ningen.description: Water bound amphibians that can sliver onto land for a small period of time, they must return to the water when they get too dry as they can die if on land for too long. They are fast and deadly in the water and can survive on land during rain.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ningen.habitat: These creatures can be found in the waters of swamps, dark forests and jungles.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ningen.combat: Ningen have a poisonous scratch and excel when in water, on land they can be defeated easily unless it is raining.
entity.lycanitesmobs.eechetik.descriptio: Dangerous Poison Elementals bursting with deadly plagues that infect all around them. They have a fondness for mushrooms! Jengu and Argus elementals can also fuse into a powerful Eechetik.
entity.lycanitesmobs.eechetik.habitat: Being Poison Elementals, Eechetik manifest in areas of poison and parasitic growths, mushrooms seem to frequently cause them to manifest when it is dark.
entity.lycanitesmobs.eechetik.combat: These elementals are inspect like in appearance and attack will their many stringer arms, their attacks rapidly spread plague so be prepared with healing items.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ent.description: 森林保護者，它們會攻擊任何它們認為對森林構成威脅的東西。
entity.lycanitesmobs.ent.habitat: 樹人可以在夜間發現遊蕩的森林，但也會合併到樹中，所以砍樹時要小心！
entity.lycanitesmobs.ent.combat: 樹人使用毒攻擊，在水中恢復生命，攻擊時也會消耗生命。斧和類似的工具非常有效。
entity.lycanitesmobs.epion.description: 巨大的陰影吸血蝙蝠。當與陽光直接接觸時，厄匹恩會掉到地上並在撞擊中爆炸！
entity.lycanitesmobs.epion.habitat: 這些蝙蝠在滿月的夜晚出現。
entity.lycanitesmobs.epion.combat: 厄匹恩向受害者吐吸血螞蟥，在被擊中時消耗生命。
entity.lycanitesmobs.erepede.description: 一種近似昆蟲的岩石類生物，它們喜歡打獵，也會在視線中攻擊死亡之蟲。
entity.lycanitesmobs.erepede.habitat: 這些昆蟲可以在沙漠和平頂山等炎熱乾燥的地形上遊盪。
entity.lycanitesmobs.erepede.combat: 艾勒派德發出危險的泥漿彈，虛弱目標。
entity.lycanitesmobs.ettin.description: 巨大的雙頭怪物。這些狂獸因為它們的破壞能力而受到威脅。
entity.lycanitesmobs.ettin.habitat: 這些狂獸經常生活在沼澤地。
entity.lycanitesmobs.ettin.combat: 食人魔動作緩慢，但會受到嚴重打擊。如果你在戰鬥中離得太近，它們會驚慌並摧毀附近的柔軟方塊，如木頭或泥土。
entity.lycanitesmobs.eyewig.description: 在黑暗中，眼睛是敵對的，可以爬過水面也可以滑過水面。
entity.lycanitesmobs.eyewig.habitat: 這些昆蟲經常在沼澤、黑暗森林和叢林中發現。
entity.lycanitesmobs.eyewig.combat: 毒眼可以從它們的巨眼發射有毒雷射！它們的撕咬也會導致失明！
entity.lycanitesmobs.fear.description: This is a dummy entity used for the fear effect, if this is in the beastiary or has a spawn egg this is a bug, please report it!
entity.lycanitesmobs.feradon.description: Lion-like predators that are excellent hunters.
entity.lycanitesmobs.feradon.habitat: These beasts thrive in plains and savannas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.feradon.combat: Feradon attack with a powerful bite that offenses the defenses of the victim.
entity.lycanitesmobs.frostweaver.descrip: Spitting spiders that thrive in cold environments.
entity.lycanitesmobs.frostweaver.habitat: These spiders can be found in cold areas such as taigas or ice plains.
entity.lycanitesmobs.frostweaver.combat: Frostweavers spit an icy web that causes slowness and creates a temporary frost web.
entity.lycanitesmobs.geist.description: Geists are opportunistic undead that deform and climb into other undead lifeforms or corpses and feed off whatever their host is capable of killing. When their host dies, Geists leap out and reform for a surprise attack!
entity.lycanitesmobs.geist.habitat: Geists usually come from other undead creatures but can also be found lurking in Dark Forests and the End.
entity.lycanitesmobs.geist.combat: Geists have a simple melee attack but on death release shadow fire, while this doesn't burn, it does cause damage and blindness.
entity.lycanitesmobs.amalgalich.descript: A powerful lich that has engulfed so many souls to power it's colossal form that it has lost it's identity and succumbed to madness. This ravaging monstrosity must be put down!
entity.lycanitesmobs.amalgalich.habitat: The Amalgalich is not natural and has no habitat data.
entity.lycanitesmobs.amalgalich.combat:
The Amalgalich is a massive undead that will constantly bombard targets with giant Spectral Bolts which cause fear and blindness, it is vital that these are avoid as fear can lead to doom!
Phase 1: The Amalgalich summons Reapers and will periodically use Consumption a powerful attack that sucks everything in leading to instant death! Any Reapers consumed will also heal the Amalgalich. So be sure to run away when it's eyes light up try not to leave too many Reapers alive for it to eat!
Phase 2: The Amalgalich will stop trying to eat, for now, instead Geists and giant Epions are summoned. Overtime the Geists will grow and grow and then eventually burst into large areas of dangerous Shadowfire, killing the Geists before they pop will stop this. If there is too much Shadowfire, killing the Epions will clear any Shadowfire beneath them. Try to keep the arena clear for Phase 3.
Phase 3: The Amalgalich is hungry again, so you better run! This time giant balls of Darklings are lobbed around the arena, it is best to keep the Darklings at bay and just damage down the boss without getting eaten. If there are too many Geists or Epions left from Phase 2, the boss can and will eat these to regain health possibly putting it back into Phase 2 again so keep those minions at bay!
entity.lycanitesmobs.geken.description: Venomous reptiles with excellent jumping abilities.
entity.lycanitesmobs.geken.habitat: These creatures like in tropical areas like jungles but can also be found in swamps.
entity.lycanitesmobs.geken.combat: Gekens constantly jump about making them harder to hit, their scratches are sharp and cause bleeding.
entity.lycanitesmobs.geonach.description: Geonachs are brutal Earth Elementals commonly found by unsuspecting miners when disturbing the earth.
entity.lycanitesmobs.geonach.habitat: Being Earth Elementals, Geonach manifest where the Earth is strong, usually within ores, breaking these ores will aggravate them.
entity.lycanitesmobs.geonach.combat: Geonach will attack rapidly with their spear arm as well as occasionally with their heavier fist for more damage. Their attacks will inflict the weight debuff which commonly traps their victims. Pickaxes and similar tools are very effective.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ghoul.description: Foul poisonous undead, Ghouls are smaller than the average zombie allowing them to crawl into smaller places.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ghoul.habitat: Ghouls can be found lurking around swamps, dark forests and jungles at night.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ghoul.combat: Ghouls attack at melee and inflict poison.
entity.lycanitesmobs.umibas.description: Huge magma worms that swim through molten lava, they can also survive on land and can burrow into soft ground like dirt.
entity.lycanitesmobs.umibas.habitat: These creatures can be found in large bodies of lava.
entity.lycanitesmobs.umibas.combat: Umibas attack by release several balls of lava everywhere, while these attacks are powerful, they are inaccurate leaving them open.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grell.description: Strange, floating creatures of writhing flesh that produce a deadly acid.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grell.habitat: These, creatures inhabit the fleshscapes of the Nether.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grell.combat: Grell fire a deadly glob of acid, have a wicked bite and let off pheromones to control nearby Grigori.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grigori.description: Aggressive, lumps of flesh with bonecrushing teeth that float through the sky. Grigori are known to travel in large swarms and hunt using taste and smell.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grigori.habitat: These, creatures can be found floating through the skies of the Nether.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grigori.combat: Grigori, have a devastating bite that cause their victims to bleed, they are simple minded creatures that attack on instinct.
entity.lycanitesmobs.gorgomite.descripti: Small rock beetles, they are known to be quite aggressive but are scared of Manticores.
entity.lycanitesmobs.gorgomite.habitat: Gorgomites are often found in the desert where they come out at night.
entity.lycanitesmobs.gorgomite.combat: These beetles are just a nuisance at first with a simple weak bite, but they will rapidly call for other Gorgomites and will begin to swarm so it is vital that they are eliminated quickly.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grue.description: When it is pitch black, you are likely to be eaten by a Grue! It is impossible to see these Shadow Elementals in complete darkness. Cinder and Argus elementals can fuse to create powerful Grues.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grue.habitat: Being Shadow Elementals, Grues spawn where it is dark and usually deep underground.
entity.lycanitesmobs.grue.combat: Grues have a nasty melee attack that inflicts blindness on top of this they will occasionally teleport behind their victim. Also, if their victim has any good effects active, Grues will devour these effects and heal!
entity.lycanitesmobs.gnekk.description: Lean pale Imps that cannot fly but use their wings to whip deadly poisonous.
entity.lycanitesmobs.gnekk.habitat: Gnekks lurk deep in dark caverns, they have adapted very effectively to this environment.
entity.lycanitesmobs.gnekk.combat: Gnekks are incredibly fast, can climb and glide and attack rapidly at melee range inflicting plague.
entity.lycanitesmobs.herma.description: Giant crabs that usually keep to themselves unless something gets too close!
entity.lycanitesmobs.herma.habitat: These creatures are found in saltwater oceans and on beaches.
entity.lycanitesmobs.herma.combat: Herma attack with their strong claws.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ignibus.description: Large fiery Drake Dragons with a hot temper, searing claws, blazing breath and a burning desire to melt your face off!
entity.lycanitesmobs.ignibus.habitat: Ignibi (plural) can be found within very large lakes, they are rare but incredibly powerful.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ignibus.combat: These Drake Dragons unleash a powerful gout of Scorchfire and hot embers that will ignite the ground and anything hit. The Scorchfire will also inflict penetration weakening defenses.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ika.description: Slow snail-turtle-shellfish! Ika can be lured and bred with vegetables, however they can only survive on land for a small amount of time. Farm with care!
entity.lycanitesmobs.ika.habitat: Ika can be found in saltwater oceans and pools on beaches.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ioray.description: Beautiful creatures that gracefully swim at a very fast rate, they have a large collection of precious gems on their back, they are quite aggressive however.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ioray.habitat: These creatures can be found in saltwater oceans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ioray.combat: Iorays have a deadly Water Jet attack that will strip away the defenses of anything hit.
entity.lycanitesmobs.jabberwock.descript: Vicious deer like creatures that rip their prey to shreds.
entity.lycanitesmobs.jabberwock.habitat: Jabberwocks can be found stalking the mountains at night.
entity.lycanitesmobs.jabberwock.combat: Jabberwocks have hooked claws will cause a weight effect pulling their victim down, this prevents any jumping and increases falling damage, making Jabberwocks deadly in the mountains.
entity.lycanitesmobs.jengu.description: Water Elementals known as the protectors of pure water, they will attack anything they see as a threat to their water's purity.
entity.lycanitesmobs.jengu.habitat: Being Water Elementals, Jengu manifest from large bodies of water in the dark.
entity.lycanitesmobs.jengu.combat: Jengu attack be throwing large blasts of water, on impact these create a temporary pool of water.
entity.lycanitesmobs.joust.description: Fierce amphibian creatures, they can be farmed and love cactus green!
entity.lycanitesmobs.joust.habitat: These creatures can be found in deserts and mesas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.joust.combat: Jousts are usually peaceful but will bite back if hit and will follow the command of aggressive Alpha Jousts.
entity.lycanitesmobs.joustalpha.descript: Larger Jousts and leaders, they will attack other Joust Alphas on sight and will also command all none alphas, they are very hostile.
entity.lycanitesmobs.joustalpha.habitat: These creatures can be found in deserts and mesas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.joustalpha.combat: Jousts are fast and attack rapidly, they will also rally other none alpha Jousts to attack with them.
entity.lycanitesmobs.khalk.description: Large magma beasts known for their incredible defense and deadly offense. On death, their bodies break down into lava!
entity.lycanitesmobs.khalk.habitat: These beasts can be found deep in lakes of lava that are underground.
entity.lycanitesmobs.khalk.combat: Khalk have an incredibly powerful melee attack that inflicts smouldering, however they are incredibly slow. Be sure to keep back when they die as they turn into a small pool of temporary lava.
entity.lycanitesmobs.kobold.description: Small rodents that can't resist stealing items including torches! Killing them will cause them to drop their stolen goods.
entity.lycanitesmobs.kobold.habitat: These rodents can usually be found in the plains at night.
entity.lycanitesmobs.kobold.combat: Kobolds usually flee from other creatures but are known to attack people who are low on health.
entity.lycanitesmobs.krake.description: Bizarre amphibious creatures, Krakes are both deaf and blind, they taste the air with their mouths and are sensitive to vibrations.
entity.lycanitesmobs.krake.habitat: These aberrations are often found lurking by rivers or lakes as well as deep within forests.
entity.lycanitesmobs.krake.combat: Krakes are neutral and will only attack if agitated, sprinting near them will threaten them so be sure to avoid sprinting near these creatures as they are incredibly fast!
entity.lycanitesmobs.lacedon.description: Strange humanoid aquatic creatures, they are able to come onto land for a small amount of time and indefinitely if it is raining.
entity.lycanitesmobs.lacedon.habitat: Lacedon can be found in saltwater oceans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.lacedon.combat: Lacedon inflict a weight debuff when attacking which will usually end with their victim being dragged into the bottom of the ocean.
entity.lycanitesmobs.cherufe.description: Large lava brutes, Cherufe are incredibly powerful creatures.
entity.lycanitesmobs.cherufe.habitat: These brutes are found in lava lakes.
entity.lycanitesmobs.cherufe.combat: Cherufe are named for their attacks where they lob large balls of magma at their victims, this very quickly begins to flood the area with temporary lava.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ostimien.descriptio: Lurkers are able to completely blend in with their environment. Their Once inflicted, they will hide, letting the poison do the work. Can be tamed as excellent pets, also great as Creeper guards!
entity.lycanitesmobs.ostimien.habitat: These creatures can be found in forests and swamps but avoid cold areas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ostimien.combat: Ostimien bites will both poison and blind, after biting the Ostimien will flee and attempt to hide allowing the poison to do it's work, they will attack again if the poison wears off.
entity.lycanitesmobs.maka.description: Large peaceful herbivores. Can be farmed with vegetables for their meat and leather. Be careful around alphas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.maka.habitat: Makas can be found in plans and savannas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.makaalpha.descripti: Larger Makas, alphas are usually peaceful but will sometimes attack, they also spar with each other a lot. Alphas Makas will protect the rest of the herd, thus they making farming Makas tricky at times.
entity.lycanitesmobs.makaalpha.habitat: Maka Alphas can be found in plans and savannas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.makaalpha.combat: When aggravated, Alpha Makas have a powerful bite and spiked tail causing high melee damage.
entity.lycanitesmobs.manticore.descripti: Vicious bat-like beasts with scorpion like tails. They like to hunt down Gorgomites and other small prey.
entity.lycanitesmobs.manticore.habitat: Manticores fly around the desert skies at night.
entity.lycanitesmobs.manticore.combat: A Manticore's sting will leave you feeling very weak and hungry!
entity.lycanitesmobs.maug.habitat: These beasts can be found in cold areas like snowy mountains or taigas.
entity.lycanitesmobs.maug.combat: Maugs have a powerful maul that will cripple causing slowness.
entity.lycanitesmobs.morock.description: Aggressive Wyvern Dragons, while they can't breathe fire, they still have a devastating bite!
entity.lycanitesmobs.morock.habitat: Morocks are found stalking the skies of open areas with a lot of tasty prey like plains, fortunately they are fairly rare.
entity.lycanitesmobs.morock.combat: Morocks are fast and bite hard, it is best to use their large size against them.
entity.lycanitesmobs.nymph.description: Whimsical Fae Elementals bursting with healing energy that heals all around them. They have a fondness for flowers! While harmless directly, they can cause trouble if scared. Jengu and Aegis Elementals can fuse to create powerful Nymphs.
entity.lycanitesmobs.nymph.habitat: Being Fae Elementals, Nymphs manifest around sources of life and as such manifest around flowers in sunlight.
entity.lycanitesmobs.nymph.combat: Nymphs are peaceful and will healing anything around them, this can be harmful to undead. If hit, Nymphs will flee firing flowers with sharp thorns that inflict bleed.
entity.lycanitesmobs.kathoga.description: Gluttonous beasts that especially love to devour live animals. Can be farmed and bred using live large animals. Baby kathoga can be tamed and when matured, can be used as battle mounts.
entity.lycanitesmobs.kathoga.habitat: Kathoga roam the Nether looking for anything to eat.
entity.lycanitesmobs.kathoga.combat: These demons are incredibly aggressive but will prioritize bigger juicier prey which ca be used to pure them.
entity.lycanitesmobs.pixen.description: Mischievous little imps that lure their prey into a false sense of security before grouping up and eating them!
entity.lycanitesmobs.pixen.habitat: Pixens can usually be found roaming around forests during the day.
entity.lycanitesmobs.pixen.combat: These Imps will bombard their targets with balls of magic that apply random debuffs.
entity.lycanitesmobs.quetzodracl.descrip: Powerful flying wyvern dragons that still share a strong resemblance to their dragon ancestors the pterosaurs.
entity.lycanitesmobs.quetzodracl.habitat: These wyverns can be found flying over oceans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.quetzodracl.combat: Quetzodracl are incredibly power and will pickup their prey, it is best to use their size against them.
entity.lycanitesmobs.brucha.description: Large rodents with razor sharp quills on their back, they are easily threatened and will fire these quills from afar.
entity.lycanitesmobs.brucha.habitat: These beasts can be found in plains, savannas and forests.
entity.lycanitesmobs.brucha.combat: Brucha attack with their deadly quills that also cut through long grass.
entity.lycanitesmobs.rahovart.descriptio: As the lord of the underworld, Rahovart's name alone strikes fear and terror into the hearts of even the most evil of beings.
entity.lycanitesmobs.rahovart.habitat: It is said that Rahovart is a very old and powerful Behemoth that originates from the Underworld a vast plane of Hell.
entity.lycanitesmobs.rahovart.combat:
Rahovart is a powerful demon that attacks with a powerful Hellfire Cannon.
Phase 1: Rahovart summons Belphs, overtime these Belphs become empowered and eventually explode giving Rahovart a Hellfire Orb. With 5 orbs, Rahovart will unleash a large wave of hellfire that causes great damage and burns away any good effects, it is important to kill the Belphs to reduce how much this happens. 
Phase 2: Rahovart continues to summon Belphs but no longer empowers them instead he also summons Behemoth that get empowered, these will give him the orbs instead, at 5 orbs Rahovart will create a giant Hellfire Wall that rotates around him, this deals damage and removes effect like wave but lasts longer so kill the Behemoths as quickly as possible. 
Phase 3: Rahovart will now create orbs on his own and will create Hellfire Barriers, these don't move but will eventually take over the area around Rahovart, however killing his minions will remove these barriers so if there are too many, kill the Belphs and Behemoth to lower the barriers.
entity.lycanitesmobs.raiko.description: Large sea birds known to dive into the ocean and snatch their prey.
entity.lycanitesmobs.raiko.habitat: These birds can be found flying over oceans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.raiko.combat: Raiko will pickup their prey, it is important to kill them before they carry you too far up. Eventually Raiko will release their prey with the weight effect, this can cause great falling damage but usually drops their victim into the deep ocean.
entity.lycanitesmobs.reaper.description: Twisted spirits that feed on death, Reapers are attracted to death and sometimes mistake people who are asleep as dead!
entity.lycanitesmobs.reaper.habitat: These spirits sometimes appear when a creature dies and sometimes when someone is attempting to sleep.
entity.lycanitesmobs.reaper.combat: Reapers have ranged attacks cause their victims to run around fear!
entity.lycanitesmobs.reiver.description: Icy Frost Elementals, Reivers seek to freeze everything around them. Jengu and Zephyr Elementals can fuse to create powerful Reivers.
entity.lycanitesmobs.reiver.habitat: Reivers are sometimes found roaming the night sky in cold areas and will also manifest from Frostfire spread by other creatures.
entity.lycanitesmobs.reiver.combat: These elementals fire icy frostbolts that freeze victims hit slowing their movement.
entity.lycanitesmobs.remobra.description: Small, flying Amphithere Dragons that spit venom.
entity.lycanitesmobs.remobra.habitat: These dragons can be found in swamps and dark forests.
entity.lycanitesmobs.remobra.combat: Remobra attack by spitting venom, if their spit hits their victim it inflicts plague, if it hits the ground, it will burst into a poisonous cloud.
entity.lycanitesmobs.roa.description: Ferocious sharks that dominate the sea! The brave or foolish attempt to tame them as mounts.
entity.lycanitesmobs.roa.habitat: These sharks can be found in saltwater oceans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.roa.combat: Roas create deadly whirlpools around them to pull their prey towards their deadly jaws! These can pull land creatures into the water as well, sneaking helps stop them pull you off the edge of a ledge.
entity.lycanitesmobs.roc.description: Rocs fly in the sky searching for prey at night.
entity.lycanitesmobs.roc.habitat: These birds usually fly over plains and savanna.
entity.lycanitesmobs.roc.combat: Rocs have strange tails that act as giant claws, they use these to pickup their vitims. Rocs are only hostile at night or in the dark however.
entity.lycanitesmobs.salamander.descript: Deadly amphibians that have adapted to incredible temperatures. Tamed Salamanders make great mounts and even protect their rider from fire!
entity.lycanitesmobs.salamander.habitat: These creatures live in lakes of lava.
entity.lycanitesmobs.salamander.combat: Salamanders have a fiery bite that inflict smouldering.
entity.lycanitesmobs.serpix.description: Notorious ice worms that burrow through the frozen earth.
entity.lycanitesmobs.serpix.habitat: These worms can be found in large pools of icy ooze and cold areas like ice plains.
entity.lycanitesmobs.serpix.combat: Serpix attack by roaring a deadly blizzard, casting Frostfire upon the ground which both damages and slows.
entity.lycanitesmobs.shade.description: Large decrepit serpentine aberrations spawned from the very shadows themselves. There are legends of the four mighty Serpent Riders who rode these beasts into battle: D'sparil, Korax, Eidelon and Lycanite.
entity.lycanitesmobs.shade.habitat: These aberrations can be found in the darkest of places, deep underground.
entity.lycanitesmobs.shade.combat: Shades drain a bit of health when attacking and they have a horrific howl sending all that oppose them running in fear!
entity.lycanitesmobs.shambler.descriptio: Overgrown shrub creatures. Can be tamed and are an excellent way to liven up the your garden!
entity.lycanitesmobs.shambler.habitat: Shamblers spawn in dense forests and jungles.
entity.lycanitesmobs.shambler.combat: Shamblers regenerate from water and can inflict paralysis, they are dangerous but very slow.
entity.lycanitesmobs.silex.description: Beautiful fish with scales encrusted with Lapis Lazuli. Silex are known to eat the Lapis off of each other's scales as well as natural formations from rocks.
entity.lycanitesmobs.silex.habitat: These fish are often found in freshwater lakes and rivers.
entity.lycanitesmobs.skylus.description: Squid like creatures that form and live in tough shells. If damaged enough, their shells will break.
entity.lycanitesmobs.skylus.habitat: These creatures can be found in saltwater oceans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.skylus.combat: Skylus with grasp their prey and drag them deep underwater, their attacks also blind with ink. When their shell is destroyed they become a lot faster but also more vulnerable to damage.
entity.lycanitesmobs.spectre.description: Mysterious Void Elementals, they seek to break down reality itself into nothing. Aegis and Argus Elementals can fuse to create a powerful Spectre.
entity.lycanitesmobs.spectre.habitat: Being Void Elementals, Spectres manifest close to the void very deep underground and in the skies of the End.
entity.lycanitesmobs.spectre.combat: Spectres will attempt to suck in their prey and will attack at close range.
entity.lycanitesmobs.spriggan.descriptio: Mystical Arbour Elementals, Spriggans protect nature against those who would threaten it. Jengu and Geonach Elementals can fuse to create powerful Spriggans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.spriggan.habitat: Being Arbour Elementals, Spriggans can be found occasionally wandering forests and rapidly manifest in the defense of plant life so take care when harvesting plants.
entity.lycanitesmobs.spriggan.combat: Spriggans fire powerful lasers that are poisonous and drain life healing the Spriggan.
entity.lycanitesmobs.deioneus.descriptio: These giant amphibious creatures somewhat resemble a shrimp, they are feared for their dreadful tentacle claws from which they ensnare and consume their victims.
entity.lycanitesmobs.deioneus.habitat: These creatures are usually found in large lakes or rivers.
entity.lycanitesmobs.deioneus.combat: Deioneus will pickup their victims and slowly drain the life out of them, they are also fast when in the water or if it raining.
entity.lycanitesmobs.sutiramu.habitat: These creatures can be found roaming the desert and mesa.
entity.lycanitesmobs.sutiramu.combat: Sutiramu attack with a venom that induce hunger.
entity.lycanitesmobs.sylph.description: Holy Aether Elementals that curse those who trespass upon holy ground. Zephyr and Aegis can fuse to create powerful Sylphs.
entity.lycanitesmobs.sylph.habitat: Being Aether Elementals, Sylphs manifest in areas of worship such as Pyramids or Temples.
entity.lycanitesmobs.sylph.combat: Sylphs will release a large wave of Aether Magic smiting those hit where they will burn in the sunlight!
entity.lycanitesmobs.lycosa.description: Poisonous jumping spiders that leave behind a trail of temporary sticky green webbing.
entity.lycanitesmobs.lycosa.habitat: Lycosa can be found in jungles and swamps.
entity.lycanitesmobs.lycosa.combat: These spiders have a poisonous bite and jump frequently, it is important to be wary of their sticky green webs.
entity.lycanitesmobs.thresher.descriptio: Giant majestic water creatures with a massive appetite and powerful fins capable of creating huge whirlpools to pull in their prey! Very dangerous!
entity.lycanitesmobs.thresher.habitat: These aquatic creatures can be found in both freshwater lakes and large rivers as well as saltwater oceans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.thresher.combat: Threshers create large whirlpools that pull in their prey from all around, it is even unsafe on land as they will also pull their prey up into the air towards them.
entity.lycanitesmobs.treant.description: Large guardians of the forest, very much like Ents only much bigger and stronger.
entity.lycanitesmobs.treant.habitat: Although rare, Trents can be found in dense forests.
entity.lycanitesmobs.treant.combat: Treants cause paralysis, drain health when attacking and regenerate from water. Axes and similar tools are very effective.
entity.lycanitesmobs.tremor.description: Explosive Quake Elementals, Tremors are incredibly destructive. Geonach and Argus Elementals can fuse to create powerful Tremors.
entity.lycanitesmobs.tremor.habitat: Being Quake Elementals, Tremors manifest from combustion and loud sounds and so occasionally manifest from large explosions.
entity.lycanitesmobs.tremor.combat: Tremors attack by creating small explosions around them, they are fairly weak but can be quite destructive and should be eliminated quickly.
entity.lycanitesmobs.triffid.description: Large carnivorous plants, slow but incredibly poisonous and deadly!
entity.lycanitesmobs.triffid.habitat: These plant creatures often lurk in swamps due to it being moist, not too cold and full of prey for them to devour.
entity.lycanitesmobs.triffid.combat: These creatures are very slow but should be handled with care as their attacks are incredibly strong and spread plague. Axes are very effective, but take heed for they will heal in water!
entity.lycanitesmobs.trite.description: Small and fast demonic creatures that appear to be a brain with spider-like legs.
entity.lycanitesmobs.trite.habitat: Trites roam all over the nether, it is said they come from Purgatory a Hell Plane of endless flesh.
entity.lycanitesmobs.trite.combat: Trites are very weak but can be hard to hit due to their speed and small size, their bites also apply wither.
entity.lycanitesmobs.troll.description: In the sun a Troll's skin is as hard as stone, in the dark a gruesome green flesh. Trolls are known to be destructive.
entity.lycanitesmobs.troll.habitat: These brutes are often found living up in the mountains.
entity.lycanitesmobs.troll.combat: Trolls have a strong melee attack and will destroy soft terrain around them. When in sunlight they become as hard as stone and have higher defense but are vulnerable to pickaxes, out of the sun they are lose their defense and are very weak to fire.
entity.lycanitesmobs.uvaraptor.descripti: Colorful raptors with extreme jumping and gliding abilities. Can be tamed as useful high jumping mounts, can almost sustain flight.
entity.lycanitesmobs.uvaraptor.habitat: These raptors are commonly found in jungles.
entity.lycanitesmobs.uvaraptor.combat: Uvaraptors leap into the air and attack their prey making them trickier to hit but also vulnerable to ranged attacks.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vapula.description: Powerful arcane Elementals that embody the essence of structure itself. Geonach and Aegis Elementals can fuse to create powerful Vapula.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vapula.habitat: Being arcane Elementals, Vapula manifest from sources of compression and structure where they are often mount amongst gemstones like diamonds.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vapula.combat: Vapula fire a round of sharp crystal projectiles from their back rapidly, once the round is fired they must recharge making them vulnerable. pickaxes and similar tools are very effective.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ventoraptor.descrip: Swift raptors that glide at incredible speeds. Can be tamed as one of the fastest known mounts.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ventoraptor.habitat: These raptors like to hunt across the plains.
entity.lycanitesmobs.ventoraptor.combat: Ventoraptors are very fast and will leap towards their prey and attack.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vespid.description: Invasive giant wasps with a poisonous sting. Vespid alone aren't much of a problem but in groups or with a Queen Vespid, they can be very dangerous. They are known to build hives when near a Queen.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vespid.habitat: These insects live in tropical areas like jungles.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vespid.combat: Vespids are fast but fairly weak, their stings are poisonous. They are often in groups and can have dangerous numbers when in a hive.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vespidqueen.descrip: Large Vespids that are protected by a swarm of standard Vespids. Queens will have nearby standard Vespids build a hive for them. Vespid Queens are known to inject eggs into Conba turning them into infected moving nests waiting to hatch!
entity.lycanitesmobs.vespidqueen.habitat: These insects live in tropical areas like jungles.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vespidqueen.combat: Vespid Queens are tougher than regular Vespids with a more powerful sting that is poisonous. They are usually surrounded by regular Vespids which will prioritize protecting their Queen above anything else.
entity.lycanitesmobs.volcan.description: Searing Lava Elementals, Volcans will melt everything in their path! Cinders and Geonach Elementals can fuse to create powerful Volcans.
entity.lycanitesmobs.volcan.habitat: Being Lava Elementals, Volcans manifest around large volumes of lava underground, they are quite rare.
entity.lycanitesmobs.volcan.combat: Volcans will melt any stone around them into lava so must be eliminated fast. Volcans attack at melee and apply the smouldering effect, however they also have a heat aura burning anything close to them.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vorach.description: Deadly demonic hunters that stalk their prey from afar, moving at great speeds when out of sight, their tails evolved into a third leg to allow for climbing.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vorach.habitat: Vorachs lurk around the dark corners of the nether.
entity.lycanitesmobs.vorach.combat: These demons can move incredibly fast, but tend to stay still when they sense that their prey is observing them. When close enough they will rush their target with a series of rapid melee attacks.
entity.lycanitesmobs.warg.description: Large wolf-like beasts with a vicious bite! They are known to hunt in packs. When tamed they make fantastic mounts!
entity.lycanitesmobs.warg.combat: Wargs have a deadly leap that briefly paralyses anything near their landing location.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wendigo.description: Large icy brutes known for leaving a trail of Frostfire in their wake!
entity.lycanitesmobs.wendigo.habitat: These brutes can be found in cold areas like ice plains a well as large pools of icy ooze.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wendigo.combat: Wendigo are slow but hurl Tundra Blasts which create pools of icy ooze on impact. They also leave Frostfire where they walk which is known to manifest Reivers if left unchecked.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wildkin.description: Powerful bipedal owl-bear beasts that are fast and swift for their size.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wildkin.habitat: These beasts are known to live in mountains and cold areas like ice plains.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wildkin.combat: Wildkin have a strong maul attack that inflicts the weight effect.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wisp.description: Bright Light Elementals, Wisps can sometimes be seen playing catch with each other throwing a deadly ball of radiation. While they're friendly, it is not wise to provoke a Wisp. Cinder and Aegis Elementals can fuse to create powerful Wisps.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wisp.habitat: being Light Elementals, Wisps manifest out in direct sunlight.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wisp.combat: Wisps will throw a ball of light radiation at their victims, on impact this will cause them to glow revealing them to any nearby potential predators. Wisps also have a light aura that cause anything near them to glow but also grants night vision, they will also burn nearby undead.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wraamon.description: Deadly rodents loaded with chaotic energy, they emit this through the spines on their back in order to attack their prey. Very few creatures dare attack these dangerous rodents.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wraamon.habitat: These rodents live deep underground, it is said they come through tiny random chaotic portals that occasionally show up through the world, where they portals lead is a mystery.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wraamon.combat: Wraamon can be a big menace, their bites inflict instability, a powerful chaos curse that causes the afflicted to randomly jolt about the place. They are fairly weak but small and fast.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wraith.description: Wicked Nether Elementals that are a symbol of pain and suffering. Zephyr and Argus Elementals can fuse to create a powerful Wraith.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wraith.habitat: Being Nether Elementals, Wraiths manifest in areas of concentrated evil such as the skies of the Nether.
entity.lycanitesmobs.wraith.combat: Wraiths are fast and will fly recklessly to their victim and attack on impact, they are fairly weak but explode upon their destruction.
entity.lycanitesmobs.xaphan.description: Corrosive Acid Elementals that embody the aspect of breaking down and dissolving away. Cinders and Jengu Elementals can fuse to create a powerful Xaphan.
entity.lycanitesmobs.xaphan.habitat: Being Acid Elementals, Xaphan manifest from mixtures such as when water meets lava.
entity.lycanitesmobs.xaphan.combat: Xaphan are constantly dripping acid beneath them and will release a ring of acid splashes all around them when attacking. Their acid is damaging and inflicts penetration increasing any incoming damage.
entity.lycanitesmobs.yale.description: Strange fluffy ram-like beasts, however under the coat of wool, they are not what they seem. Yales provide wool which can be obtained using shears, they can also be farmed with vegetables. Their horns are actually strange limbs and they have tiny hooked arms that they use to sift through grass with.
entity.lycanitesmobs.yale.habitat: These beasts can be found roaming the mountains.
entity.lycanitesmobs.yeti.description: Large frosty mammals that like to eat the frozen vegetation of the arctic. They can be farmed using vegetables, but watch out for their frost clouds. Yeti milk is a delicacy!
entity.lycanitesmobs.yeti.habitat: These beasts often roam cold and snowy areas such as taiga.
entity.lycanitesmobs.raidra.description: Fierce Electric Elementals with a powerful electric field around them. Cinders and Zephyr Elementals can fuse to create powerful Raidra.
entity.lycanitesmobs.raidra.habitat: Being Electric Elementals, Raidra manifest from electric weather such as thunderstorms, they can also rarely manifest during regular rainstorms as well.
entity.lycanitesmobs.raidra.combat: Raidra will shock any foe close to them and direct attacks from them cause paralysis.
entity.lycanitesmobs.zoataur.description: Zoataur are incredibly resilient drakes, while they are too bulky to be able to fly, their wings are incredibly dense and are used to block enemy attacks.
entity.lycanitesmobs.zoataur.habitat: These beasts can be found roaming open plains and deserts.
entity.lycanitesmobs.zoataur.combat: Zoataur are slow but hit hard, they will also block with their wings so it is best to hit them with slow heavy attacks when they are exposed. They can't attack when blocking.
death.attack.ooze: %1$s was frozen in the icy ooze!
effect.poison.description: Causes damage over time, however the poison effect cannot kill.
effect.levitation.description: Causes the afflicted to slowly float upwards, when it expires they being to fall back down.
effect.glowing.description: Causes the afflicted to glow, any nearby hostile creatures will be attracted to them and will always see where they are.
effect.wither.description: Causes damage over time and can kill.
effect.weakness.description: Reduces the damage dealt by the afflicted.
effect.mining_fatigue.description: Reduces the speed of tool usage and attacking.
effect.burning.description: Causes damage over time and can kill but can be extinguished using water. Some creatures will spread burning when they attack.
effect.paralysis.description: Drastically reduces movement speed and prevents jumping.
effect.penetration.description: Weakens defenses, increasing any damage received.
effect.recklessness.description: Drastically weakens defenses but also increases damage dealt.
effect.rage.description: Causes the afflicted to lose their mind and attack anything nearby.
effect.weight.description: Creates a constant downwards pull increasing falling speed and preventing jumping or swimming/flying upwards.
effect.fear.description: Causes the afflicted to lose their mind and run around uncontrollably.
effect.instability.description: Randomly pushes the afflicted around in all directions.
effect.lifeleak.description: Causes any damage dealt by the afflicted to heal instead.
effect.bleed.description: Deals damage rapidly over time if the afflicted moves.
effect.plague.description: Instantly poisons the afflicted and then spreads Plague one level lower or Poison if lowest level to nearby creatures.
effect.aphagia.description: Prevents eating and the use of various items.
effect.repulsion.description: Pushes away attackers and also prevents being picked up or latched onto.
effect.smited.description: Causes the afflicted to burn in sunlight.
effect.smouldering.description: Constantly applies burning to the afflicted, staying in water can suppress but not remove this.
effect.absorption.description: Gives a shield that acts like additional health.
effect.invisibility.description: Hides the affected reducing how well enemies can see them.
effect.jump_boost.description: Increases jumping height but does not prevent falling damage.
effect.haste.description: Increases the mining speeds of tools and attack speed of some weapons.
effect.immunization.description: Removes and grants immunity to poison, hunger, weakness, nausea and paralysis.
effect.cleansed.description: Removes and grants immunity to wither, bad luck, fear and insomnia.
element.xeno.description: As a Super element,Xeno is an unstable element which converts regular matter into Xeno magic on contact but is very unstable and decays quickly into chaos magic.
element.coda.description: As a Super element,Coda is able to rearrange the order of events and efficiently speed up and slow down time.
element.bose.description: As a Super element,Bose is a tightly packed set of molecules which are so dense they act as one particle, it is almost indestructible.
element.mote.description: As a Super element,Mote is an element of disintegration, blasts of it turn things into infinitely fine dust.
element.murati.description: As a Super element,Murati is a form of water which has a swarming property, it acts like a superfluid so it ripples indefinitely and swarms around things.
element.glasma.description: As a Super element,Glasma is an extremely hot substance forged with two fire crystals (which in turn are forged by the twin suns of the eldritch expanse), it flows upwards and burns everything it touches.
element.fire.description: A base element that represents plasma and raw energy. It can be extracted from the para elements: Acid, Lava, Lightning, Light and Shadow.
element.water.description: A base element that represents fluids, predominantly water itself. Water can be extracted from the para elements: Acid, Arbour, Frost, Fae and Poison.
element.earth.description: A base element that represents solid form, from the dirt to rocks, crystals and even metal or bone. It can be extracted from the para elements: Lava, Arbour, Phase, arcane and Quake.
element.air.description: A base element that represents gas but is often known only for its ability to control the flow of wind. It can be extracted from the para elements: Lightning, Ice, Phase, Aether and Nether.
element.order.description: A base element that represents sequence and balance, while these are very hypothetical concepts, Order has a very physical presence in magical universes with a basic form being raw force. Order can be extracted from the para elements: Light, Fae, arcane, Aether and Void.
element.chaos.description: A base element that represents entropy, growth and destruction. It can be extracted from the para elements: Shadow, Poison, Quake, Nether and Void.
element.acid.description: A para element that represents corrosion and physical consumption but can be expanded into a wide range of chemistry and also despite the name Acid it also covers base substances as well. Acid can be fused from the base elements Fire and Water as it embodies both the energy based properties of Fire and the fluid substance based properties of Water.
element.lava.description: A para element that represents embodied heat, while Fire is more about plasma and energy, Lava is about energy storage and the effects of heat. Lava can be fused from the base elements Fire and Earth as it embodies the energy aspect of Fire and the dense mass aspect of Earth.
element.lightning.description: A para element that represents electrical current and energy. Lightning can be fused from the base elements Fire and Air as it embodies the energy and plasma aspects of Fire with the flowing and non-grounded aspects of Air.
element.light.description: A para element that represents radiation making it a very dangerous force as it can range from the visible light spectrum that the element is named after to the more deadlier ranges of radiation that can cause serious damage. Light can be fused from the base elements Fire and Order as it embodies the energy aspect of Fire and the refinement of Order.
element.shadow.description: A para element that represents darkness as a force that stops radiation or energy generation. Shadow can be fused from Fire and Chaos as it embodies the energy aspect of Fire which is then inverted by Chaos into a force that goes against energy creation cancelling it out.
element.arbour.description: A para element that represents growth and nature, it is closely based around plants with make heavy use of this element. Arbour can be fused from Water and Earth as it embodies the fluid form of water with the solid presence of Earth.
element.frost.description: A para element that represents cold where it actively repels any form of heat. Frost can be fused from Water and Air as it embodies the fluid cooling nature of Water and the cooling flow of Air.
element.fae.description: A para element that represents life and adaption. Fae can be fused from Water and Order as it embodies the fluid nature of Water and the structure of Order.
element.poison.description: A para element that represents chemical substances, usually poisons or venom as well as narcotics and also medicines but can also take on many other forms as well such as oil. Poison can be fused from Water and Chaos where Water embodies a fluid form that can be altered which is manipulated by Chaos into all kinds of strange chemicals.
element.phase.description: A para element that represents phase shifting or spiritual reality, a space layered on top of the physical world, it is what spirits are made of and use. Phase can be fused from the base elements Earth and Air as it embodies the solid form of Earth and the flowing non-solid of Air.
element.arcane.description: A para element that represents gravitation, magnetism, bonding, compression and artificial structure. arcane can be fused from Earth and Order where it embodies the solid physical presence of Earth and the structure and laws of Order.
element.quake.description: A para element that represents vibration, sound, combustion and destruction. Quake can be fused from Earth and Chaos where Earth embodies solid form which is then broke apart by Chaos.
element.aether.description: A para element that represents purity, divinity, faith and worship. Aether can be fused from Air and Order as it embodies the flowing aspect of Air with the structure and laws of Order.
element.nether.description: A para element that represents corruption, demonism, desire and rebellion. Nether can be fused from Air and Chaos where Air embodies flowing and Chaos twists it into corruption.
element.void.description: A para element that represents nothingness and removal. Void can be fused from Order and Chaos where Order embodies structure and consistency which is cancelled out by Chaos which embodies entropy and randomness.
item.lycanitesmobs.whirlwindcharge.descr: Use to release a ring of whirlwinds or fire from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.demonicblastcharge.de: Use to throw a demonic lightning blast! Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.magmacharge.descripti: Use to throw a ball of lava! Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.frostboltcharge.descr: Use to fire a bolt of ice. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.spectralboltcharge.de: Use to throw a Spectral Bolt. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
A curved metal blade, use to throw or triple fire from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.boulderblastcharge.de: Use to throw a giant boulder! Can be fired from a dispenser, causes dig speed slowdown.
item.lycanitesmobs.acidglobcharge.descri: Use to lob a slimy glob of acid. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.acidsplashcharge.desc: Use to fire a wave of acid. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.faeboltcharge.descrip: Use to fire a bolt of fae energy, this deals no damage but applies the lifeleak debuff converting all damage dealt into healing. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.embercharge.descripti: Use to throw a small flame or spray from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.venomshotcharge.descr: Use to throw a ball of venom that creates a poisonous cloud and inflicts plague.
item.lycanitesmobs.poisonraycharge.descr: Use to fire a poisonous beam.
item.lycanitesmobs.poopcharge.descriptio: Very smelly! Throw it! Can also be used on plants as a fertilizer like bonemeal.
item.lycanitesmobs.lifedraincharge.descr: Use to fire a quick life draining beam, or fire from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.aquapulsecharge.descr: Use to throw a ball of mystic water or fire from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.arcanelaserstormcharg: Use to fire a large blast of arcane magic energy with lasers bursting from it. Can be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.lightballcharge.descr: Use to throw a ball of light. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.doomfireballcharge.de: Use to place throw a ball of Doomfire. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.aetherwavecharge.desc: Use to release a wave of aether energy. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.mudshotcharge.descrip: A ball of vibrating mud. Use to throw or fire from a dispencer. Applies weakness.
item.lycanitesmobs.hellfireballcharge.de: Use to throw a ball of Hellfire. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.tundracharge.descript: Use to launch a ball of ooze. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.quillcharge.descripti: A razor sharp quill, can be thrown or fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.crystalshardcharge.de: Use to throw a crystal shard. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
Use to throw a ball of scorchfire. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.bloodleechcharge.desc: Use to throw a Bloodleech. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.frostwebcharge.descri: Use to throw a frosty web. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.chaosorbcharge.descri: Use to unleash an orb of chaos. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.lobdarklingscharge.de: Use to lob a shadowy ball of vicious Darklings! Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.icefireballcharge.des: Use to launch a ball of icefire. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.blizzardcharge.descri: Use to throw a small wave of icefire. Can also be fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.waterjetcharge.descri: Use to fire a water jet or fire from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.devilstarcharge.descr: Use to throw a small devilstar. Can also be rapid fired from a dispenser.
item.lycanitesmobs.equipmentpart.descrip: This item can be used to create powerful equipment using an Equipment Forge or can be crafted into a useful resource.
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_arisaur_meat.desc: A beef-like meat. 'Stunningly good' to eat raw!
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_joust_meat.des: A chicken-like meat. Spicy! Tastes like peri peri chicken!
item.lycanitesmobs.amber_cake.descriptio: A spicy cake full of sugar! Applies a speed boost!
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_silex_meat.descri: A fish-like meat. Very sharp and bony!
item.lycanitesmobs.devil_lasagna.descrip: A delicious meaty pasta dish that surges with demonic strength.
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_kathoga_meat.desc: A pork-like meat. Withering demonic energy pulses through this meat, it must be cleansed by fire.
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_yale_meat.descrip: A mutton-like meat. Very chewy when raw!
item.lycanitesmobs.battle_burrito.descri: A powerful fusion of many tasty meats! Applies: Strength, Resistance, Absorption, Health Boost and Heals!
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_concapede_meat.de: A rabbit-like meat. Close your eyes and pretend that it is delicious!
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_yale_meat.desc: A mutton-like meat. Tastes like minty roast lamb.
item.lycanitesmobs.peaks_kebab.descripti: The food of the mountains, increases arm strength for mining speed, the best a miner could eat!
Swim through the water with the grace of a Silex after eating this delicacy. The chips are chunky fries rather than thin crispy potato wafers.
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_kathoga_meat.d: A pork-like meat. Tastes like very rich, salty beef. Provides strength.
item.lycanitesmobs.bulwark_burger.descri: Take on the tough defense of the mighty Maka! Applies absorption.
item.lycanitesmobs.explorers_risotto.des: A mighty dish bursting with power! Applies: Movement Speed, Dig Speed, Water Breathing and Jump Boost!
item.lycanitesmobs.paleo_salad.descripti: The healthiest food you can eat! Increases all healing received.
item.lycanitesmobs.blood_chili.descripti: An intense chili that empowers the consumer allowing them to consume the life force of any creature they attack, healing them.
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_ika_meat.descript: A fish-like meat! Fishy seafood! It feels very heavy.
item.lycanitesmobs.seashell_maki.descrip: A taste infusion from the deep blue sea! Applies water breathing!
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_chupacabra_mea: A beef-like meat. While the creature it comes from is disgusting, once cooked, this rich meat is absolutely delicious!
item.lycanitesmobs.searing_taco.descript: So spicy that it makes you immune to fire!
item.lycanitesmobs.moss_pie.description: A hearty, rich meaty pie! Applies regeneration.
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_aspid_meat.des: A beef-like meat. Crumbles apart in the mouth, delicious, a bit like slow cooked beef!
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_chupacabra_meat.d: A beef-like meat. Scaly flesh that oozes with blood. Eating it raw can cause terrifying hallucinations!
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_maka_meat.descrip: A pork-like meat. Very chewy, eating this raw will cause weakness.
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_aspid_meat.descri: A beef-like meat. Smells like beef seasoned with cumin. Looks poisonous.
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_yeti_meat.descrip: A pork-like meat. It feels very cold...
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_concapede_meat: A rabbit-like meat. Tastes like rabbit! Does not look like it though!
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_arisaur_meat.d: A beef-like meat. Imbued with the gift of nature with impurities cooked out, increases all healing received.
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_joust_meat.descri: A chicken-like meat. Looks chewy and smells like feet, applies movement slowdown, best cook it.
item.lycanitesmobs.pale_soup.description: A milky soup that bolsters resistance.
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_maka_meat.desc: A pork-like meat. Has a subtle bacon like taste.
item.lycanitesmobs.tropical_curry.descri: Bursting full of exotic flavours! Bouncy!
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_ika_meat.descr: A fish-like meat. Crispy seafood! Cooking it has made it much lighter!
item.lycanitesmobs.raw_krake_meat.descri: A rabbit-like meat. It seems to still be moving slightly, probably not safe to eat.
item.lycanitesmobs.cooked_krake_meat.des: A rabbit-like meat. Has a strong texture and a rich savory taste, seems to be vibrating slightly.
item.lycanitesmobs.caecilian_ramen.descr: A delightful dish with a fresh fried egg on top, the noodles seem to be vibrating!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulgazer.description: Use on a creature to add it to the Beastiary. To open your Beastiary, either click on the Beastiary tab of your survival inventory or press the Beastiary key (set via the Controls menu).
item.lycanitesmobs.mobtoken.description: A cosmetic item used to display creature models as achievement icons, etc.
item.lycanitesmobs.immunizer.description: A special potion that immunizes against poison, hunger, weakness, nausea and paralysis.
item.lycanitesmobs.cleansingcrystal.desc: A magical crystal imbued with spiritual energy, protects against wither, bad luck, fear and insomnia.
item.lycanitesmobs.geistliver.descriptio: It has a very musky odor... Use to squeeze out a gout of Shadowfire.
item.lycanitesmobs.frostyfur.description: As cold as snow, use to create a frost cloud.
item.lycanitesmobs.poisongland.descripti: Squeeze to place a poison cloud!
item.lycanitesmobs.bucketooze.descriptio: Ooze is an icy gel substance, causes slowness and applies low damage over time.
item.lycanitesmobs.bucketrabbitooze.desc: Just as cold and dangerous as regular Ooze but no mobs spawn in this and can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.bucketmoglava.descrip: Clearer that regular lava, flows slightly faster and no mobs spawn in this. Can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.bucketacid.descriptio: 一種致命的物質，會滲透並在一段時間內造成損害。
item.lycanitesmobs.bucketsharacid.descri: Refined acid, just as deadly but no mobs spawn in this and can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.bucketvesspoison.desc: Just as foul as regular poison but no mobs spawn in this and can be renewed like water.
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergift.descriptio: Good tidings, Happy Yuletide and Merry Christmas! Open it up and do see what's inside!
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergift.good: You open your present and it's a pleasant surprise!
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergift.bad: Oh no! It's a gift of pain, misery and nightmares!
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergiftlarge.descr: It's December 25th! Time to open your big presents! Ignore the screeching sound the box makes, it's nothing...
item.lycanitesmobs.wintergiftlarge.bad: Aaaahhhhh Haaa Haaa Haaa Ha Ha Ha! Bwahahahah! Happy Holidays!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulkey.description: Use to activate a summoning altar to call for a rare monster or activate a special event.
item.lycanitesmobs.soulkeydiamond.descri: A more powerful Soul Key capable for summoning more powerful bosses!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulkeyemerald.descri: A more powerful Soul Key capable for summoning more powerful bosses!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone.description: Use on a tamed creature to bind it to your spirit allowing you to summon and dismiss it anywhere anytime. Bound pets or mounts will also respawn after death.
The eerie soul of an Aberration resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_angel.descr: The sacred soul of an Angel resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_aquatic.des: The elegant soul of an Aquatic creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_amphibian.d: The strange soul of an Amphibian resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_arachnid.de: The strange soul of an Arachnid resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_avian.descr: The swift soul of an Avian creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_beast.descr: The vicious soul of a Beast resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_reptile.des: The vicious soul of a Reptile resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
The mighty soul of a Anthronian resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_demon.descr: The wicked soul of a Demon resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_dragon.desc: The proud soul of a Dragon resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_elemental.d: The magical essence of an Elemental resides within this Essencestone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_imp.descrip: The mischievous soul of an Imp resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_plant.descr: The flourishing soul of a Plant creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_undead.desc: The tireless soul of an Undead creature resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_worm.descri: The relentless soul of a Worm resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_golem.descr: The mechanical soul of a Golem resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.soulstone_slime.descr: The remnant soul of a Slime resides within this Soulstone, unleash it and make it yours!
item.lycanitesmobs.aquapulsescepter.desc: Low Damage, Charge Up, Applies Penetration, Places Water
item.lycanitesmobs.scorchfirescepter.des: Low Damage, Rapid Fire, Applies Fire, Places Scorchfire
item.lycanitesmobs.wraithsigil.descripti: This skull is full to the brim with evil Wraiths! Use to fire a wave of angry Wraiths forwards towards your victim! Results can be explosive!
item.lycanitesmobs.mudshotscepter.descri: Mid Damage, Rapid Fire, Applies Weakness
item.lycanitesmobs.venomshotscepter.desc: Low Damage, Rapid Fire, Applies Poison, Places Poison Clouds
item.lycanitesmobs.blizzardscepter.descr: Mid Damage, Spray Fire, Places Icefire
item.lycanitesmobs.bloodleechscepter.des: Low Damage, Rapid Fire, Drains Health
item.lycanitesmobs.doomfirescepter.descr: Mid Damage, Rapid Fire, Applies Fire, Places Fire
item.lycanitesmobs.frostboltscepter.desc: Mid Damage, Rapid Fire, Applies Move Slowdown
item.lycanitesmobs.poopscepter.descripti: Low Damage, Rapid Fire, Applies Slowness and Nausea, Places Poop Clouds
item.lycanitesmobs.tundrascepter.descrip: High Damage, Charge Up, Places Ooze
item.lycanitesmobs.magmascepter.descript: High Damage, Charge Up, Applies Fire, Places Lava
item.lycanitesmobs.hellfirescepter.descr: High Damage, Charge Up, Applies Fire, Places Hellfire
item.lycanitesmobs.emberscepter.descript: Mid Damage, Spray Fire, Applies Fire
item.lycanitesmobs.icefirescepter.descri: Low Damage, Rapid Fire, Places Icefire
item.lycanitesmobs.arcanelaserstormscept: High Damage, Charge Up, Lasers Fly Off
item.lycanitesmobs.demoniclightningscept: High Damage, Charge Up, Applies Wither, Damaging Sparks Fly Off
item.lycanitesmobs.spectralboltscepter.d: Medium Damage, Rapid Fire, Causes Fear
item.lycanitesmobs.frostwebscepter.descr: Low Damage, Rapid Fire, Applies Move Slowdown, Places Frostwebs
item.lycanitesmobs.boulderblastscepter.d: High Damage, Charge Up, Applies Dig Speed Slowdown
item.lycanitesmobs.summoningstaff.descri: Summon minions to do your bidding! Start using to create a portal, over time the portal will drain your Summoning Focus (above your hunger bar).
Summoned minions last longer but costs more focus.
item.lycanitesmobs.bloodsummoningstaff.d: Half the focus cost by sacrificing your health in its place.
Summon double minions, but at half health each.
This staff lasts much longer but costs more focus.
item.lycanitesmobs.cinderfallsword.descr: Imbued with the souls of Cinders! On hit: Deals additional damage as armor piercing fire damage, ignites, chance of summoning a Cinder minion.
An improved Cinderfall Sword that will summon Azure Cinders for an increased amount of time and deals more damage.
item.lycanitesmobs.verdantcinderfallswor: An improved Cinderfall Sword that will summon Verdant Cinders with a higher chance and deals more damage.
item.lycanitesmobs.venomaxeblade.descrip: Imbued with the souls of Remobra. Effective as both a sword and an axe. On hit: Applies Poison, Chance of summoning Remobra minion. On hold: Poison Immunity.
item.lycanitesmobs.goldenvenomaxeblade.d: An improved Venom Axeblade that summons Golden Remobra for an increased amount of time and deals more damage.
An improved Venom Axeblade that summons Verdant Remobra with a higher chance and deals more damage.
item.lycanitesmobs.aberrationtreat.descr: A dark effigy made as tribute to a mysterious creature, but can you win it over?
item.lycanitesmobs.angeltreat.descriptio: There are currently no Angel creatures added yet.
item.lycanitesmobs.aquatictreat.descript: Made from tender fish, you can tame some aquatic creatures with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.amphibiantreat.descri: Made from tender fish, you can tame some amphibians creatures with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.arachnidtreat.descrip: Made from fresh fruits, all sorts of arachnids will want to gorge on this.
item.lycanitesmobs.insecttreat.descripti: Made from fresh fruits, all sorts of insects will want to gorge on this.
item.lycanitesmobs.aviantreat.descriptio: Made from light meats, you can tame some avian creatures with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.beasttreat.descriptio: Made from juicy meats, you can tame some beasts with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.reptiletreat.descript: Made from juicy meats, you can tame some reptiles with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.anthroniantreat.descr: Made from fatty meats, Brutes are quite simple minded, could any be swayed by this?
item.lycanitesmobs.demontreat.descriptio: All demons seem to enjoy snacking on Nether Wart between their meals of live flesh.
item.lycanitesmobs.dragontreat.descripti: A treasure adorned with fine jewels, dragons love treasure.
item.lycanitesmobs.elementaltreat.descri: Creative only, elementals can be summoned but not tamed.
item.lycanitesmobs.imptreat.description: Imps are unruly fiends but they can't resist the taste of rich meant.
item.lycanitesmobs.planttreat.descriptio: Made from fresh vegetables and sugar cane, some plant creatures can be tamed with this.
item.lycanitesmobs.undeadtreat.descripti: Made from the finest rotten flesh, but can any undead creature be swayed by this?
item.lycanitesmobs.wormtreat.description: Made from very gamey meat, those worm creatures seem to like that.
item.lycanitesmobs.golemtreat.descriptio: Made from the finest machine parts, those golem creatures seem to like that.
item.lycanitesmobs.slimetreat.descriptio: Made from very bouncy slime, those slime creatures seem to like that.
